explanation: The stage direction describes the arrival of an angel, which is an entrance of a character on stage. The phrase indicates that this angel will come in dressed in white and holding a flaming sword, emphasizing that it is a moment of entry into the scene.
stgdir: Alors viendra un ange, tout de blanc habillé, une épée flamboyante à la main, que Dieu placera à la porte du paradis, en lui disant :
